name: Oh, I'm a Cat Now I guess
name_original: Oh, I'm a Cat Now I guess
description:
Suddenly, you're a cat. You have no memories from before you were a cat, just the knowledge that you were never a cat before this moment

So, as a cat, you explore your world. Gathering information about the way it works and learning what you want to do.

The world you explore is full of strange people and unique, dreamy situations. The graphics are very simple but also very colorful. The music is strange and endearing

There are puzzles to solve, people to help, mazes to master, and items to collect

NOTE: At this point, sound doesn't work in Safari. I hope a fix will come soon!

This game was made with the awesome software Mosi. Mosi is very similar to the wonderful Bitsy, but allows the player to use up to 8 colors per screen, variable resolution sprites, and has a simple music maker. You can use Mosi in your web browser here
